articles.title: Microsoft Interested in Buying Warner Bros' Gaming Unit: Report - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Microsoft has expressed interest in buying Warner Bros' gaming unit, The Information reported on Monday, citing two people familiar with the matter.
articles.content:
Microsoft has expressed interest in buying Warner Bros' gaming unit, The Information reported on Monday, citing two people familiar with the matter.

articles.title: Realme X3 series, Narzo 10, Realme TV to go on sale in India today at 12 noon - PocketNow
articles.description: The Realme X3 price starts at Rs 24,999 for the base 6GB RAM + 128GB storage option, whereas the 8GB RAM + 128GB storage model costs Rs 25,999.
